commit.message:
refactor(react_renderer): Bring into main config (#1070)

* refactor(react_renderer): Bring into main config

We don't need a separate node_modules setup for this one script, especially with all the overlapping dependencies! So we simplify the setup a bit.

We leave the output file in the same place (react_renderer/dist/app.js) because why not.

* remove react_renderer/node_modules from tests.yml

* remove react_renderer package install script

* remove react_renderer from dependabot config!

sneak in a few arbitrary dependabot updates to hopefully make managing the flood of PRs easier.

* fix(Dockerfile): build react_renderer/dist/app.js

* fix test.yml parse error

* add command to build react renderer asset

* add command to build react renderer asset
